Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: sighting detailscame out to the porch, noticed what seemed to be a moving star. realized by movements and change in light it was not a star. could not have been a jet\plane or helicopter with the speed and directional change. it would change from bright white light to duller red. emitted way looked like red sparks. seemed to be encased in a black cloud but it is a crystal clear night. it moved in vertical circles but would also fall and rise very abruptly. generally stayed within the same area. had a very strange feeling about the object that it was not man made. watched it for close to 2 hours with it ascending but not too terribly much.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Nacogdoches
There were no other sightings in Nacogdoches on or around October 8th 2013
Summary: White/red light hovering in the sky, moving abruptly up, down, and in circles
